H0.text: where was the last world cup held and who won. Brazil

H1.text: where was the last world cup held and who won. Argentina

H2.text: where was the last world cup held and who won. Spain

H3.text: where was the last world cup held and who won. Germany

A4.text: It took place in Qatar from 20 November to 18 December 2022, after the country was awarded the hosting rights in 2010.

A5.text: Argentina were crowned the champions after winning the final against the title holder France 4–2 on penalties following a 3–3 draw after extra time.
